long_description: Get dependable performance with the SRAM X7 9-speed rear derailleur, which offers rugged construction and no-fuss shifting for your mountain bike. Constructed out of tough forged aluminum with serviceable sealed pulleys. 1:1 actuation ratio means that when the cable moves, the derailleur moves the same amount for simple setup and dependable performance. Direct cable routing reduces the amount of friction for enhanced shifting performance.
short_description: Get dependable performance with the SRAM X7 9-speed rear derailleur, which offers rugged construction and no-fuss shifting for your mountain bike.
